description: The three time undefeated Brenn Wyson returns to NK this week to take on Jack Hammer, in what has been touted to be the match of the year. Brenn arrived with stitches in his eyebrow, from a previous fight, which set the tone for the day. This is Jack's second time on NK. He has kickboxing experience and is trained in jiu jitsu. If his fighting experience isn't enough to intimidate Brenn, then his humongous cock definitely will. He has a solid strategy to slam it into Brenn's tight ass, but only after he has his fun and wears his opponent down in the first three rounds. Brenn is strong and confident and refuses to take that giant dick. His plan is to rely on his boxing and MMA background to bring Jack down, keep him down and then tear his ass up. Watch as these two go head to head in what is sure to be an all out brawl.
title: Brenn Wyson vs Jack Hammer
